original_title: Teenage boys injured after school wall collapses
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two Grade 11 students sustained minor injuries after a wall at the Ambakadawila Vidyalaya in Chilaw collapsed.
Sri Lanka Police said that the two boys had climbed onto the gate this morning, and it was at that moment that the gate and wall collapsed.
One student was discharged from the hospital, while the other continues to receive treatment at the Chilaw General Hospital.
